page.title: 09COMMUTERS.HAUGHTON,SPURSTOW.
page.content: ______________________________ Haughton is a farming community with many people commuting to neighbouring towns and villages. A school cook travels five miles to Bickley and her husband is a salesman travelling all over the country. A solicitor and a county council worker have a daily journey of 17 miles to Chester. Some people find work in Crewe - a main railway link - among them a British Rail controller and a pharmacist, who is the wife of a local farmer. Nantwich is another country town 7 miles away to which people commute; an agricultural engineer and a dress shop manageress whose husband is a director of a national charity, also a vet has a surgery in Nantwich. Another young man works with computers in Liverpool and we have a tanner working in Birkenhead.
